{{Infobox Network Adapter |image1 = |image1_size = |caption = |caption2 = |pp = |sp = |dl = |wikidevi = Intel_PRO/Wireless_2100_(WM3A2100) |wikipedia = |brand = Intel |model = PRO/Wireless 2100 |submodelappend = |submodel = |revision = |subrevision = |model_part_num = WM3A2100 |sernum = |wlclass = B11 |series = |if = Mini PCI |if_bus_version = |ifconnector = |formfactor = Type IIIA |vendor_id = 8086 |device_id = 1043 |subvendor_id = 8086 |subdevice_id = 2523 |id_string = |windosid = |fcc_id = PD9WM3A2100 |icid = |boardid = |ecc_id = |oui = 00:04:23 |chip1 = Intel;82531ME; |chip2 = Symbol;51-23130-130; |chip3 = Philips;SA2400A; |chip4 = |antconn = U.FL |antenna = |wirelessstand = IEEE 802.11b |802.11b = 11 |wififreq = 2.4 |receive_sens = |transmit_power = |linuxdriv = |windriv = |is_manuf = No |manuf = |manuf_model = |manuf_rev = |addchip = |flags = |802dot11_protocols = b |accessible_UART = No |accessible_JTAG = |category = |availability = |eoldate = |fccapprovdate = 12/27/2002 |estreldate = |estprice = |upc = |ean = |dx_sku = |newegg = |asin = |asin_country = |asin2 = |asin_country2 = |countrymanuf = |powledcolor = |connactled = |spdledcolor = |leddupcolor = |dimmin = |weight = }}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== Per the FCC photos, this card is using the following... *An '''Intel''' MAC marked "82531ME", , , (M)(C)2002", "KOREA" *A '''Symbol''' baseband processor marked "SYMBOL", "DELAWARE 1.0", "51-23130-130", *A '''Philips''' SA2400ABE 2.4 GHz RFIC Additional relevant cards + FCC IDs... *'''Dell''' E2K24CLNS - P/C WN3A2100NADELL, model WM3A2100, '''Dell''' P/N 09Y200, 00:04:23 OUI *'''Quanta''' - HFSWM3B2100 ===Product codes=== *WM3A2100NA - North American model (ch1-11) *WM3A2100WW - Worldwide model (ch1-14) ==Links of Interest== [http://www.driverlookup.com/device-name/intel-r-pro-wireless-lan-2100-3a-mini-pci-adapter Driver download] - Hardware ID also has the name of :''Intel PRO/Wireless LAN 2100 3A Mini PCI Adapter'':
